name: MONOLITH
description: MONOLITH Web Solutions is an innovative web solutions company, based in Netanya, Israel. Their track record stands on over 5 years of ambitious innovation and their clientele includes some of the leading companies in Israel. They are a master of a wide range of development & creative web solutions, led by their devoted team of experts. They also offer a complete all included support package, based on a 24/7 model.
